name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Gas ; All types of boilers (water treatment in boilers) ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 燃气 ; 全部类型锅炉（锅内水处理） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste waterisPhysical + chemical + comprehensive utilization，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste waterisPhysical + chemical + comprehensive utilization，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及使用各种类型的燃气在所有规模的锅炉中产生蒸汽、热水或热能的利用。它包括锅炉内的水处理过程，以维持其效率和寿命。该数据集还涉及用于工业过程中废水处理和化学需氧量（COD）减少的末端治理技术。该技术结合了物理和化学处理方法以及全面利用实践，以提高污染控制效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5449页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + comprehensive utilization，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理+化学法+综合利用，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=（锅炉运行小时数-废水处理设施的故障小时数）/锅炉运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
源文件中描述为为燃气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for Boiler wastewaterisPhysical + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标锅炉排污废水的末端治理技术是物理+化学法，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=（锅炉运行小时数-废水处理设施的故障小时数）/锅炉运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为锅炉排污废水，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为锅炉排污废水。
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management59.49
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理+化学法，其效率为59.49，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=（锅炉运行小时数-废水处理设施的故障小时数）/锅炉运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste waterisPhysical + chemical + comprehensive utilization，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management100.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 9.86（锅炉排污水）。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 9.86（锅炉排污水）. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是物理+化学法+综合利用，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=（锅炉运行小时数-废水处理设施的故障小时数）/锅炉运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量原文描述的产污系数为 9.86（锅炉排污水）。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
